alert.note: Alert for Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 19 at 5:47AM EDT until March 19 at 6:30AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Gulf County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 630 AM EDT/530 AM CDT/. * At 546 AM EDT/446 AM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles west of Port St. Joe, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Port St. Joe, Honeyville, Highland View, St Joseph State Park, Jones Homestead, Ward Ridge, Milltown, Howard Creek, Willis Landing, Simmons Bayou, Beacon Hill, Dalkeith and Saint Joe Beach. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
